price: (Hûd ) dedi ki: «Ey kavmim! Bende beyinsizlik yok; fakat ben, Âlemlerin Rabbi tarafından gönderilmiş bir peygamberim.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī safāhatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
